** align environment
.
\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\begin{document}
\begin{align}
a &= b \\
c &= d
\end{align}
\end{document}
.

** align* environment
.
\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\begin{document}
\begin{align*}
a &= b \\
c &= d
\end{align*}
\end{document}
.

** gather environment
.
\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\begin{document}
\begin{gather}
a+b=c \\
d+e=f
\end{gather}
\end{document}
.

** gather* environment
.
\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\begin{document}
\begin{gather*}
a+b=c \\
d+e=f
\end{gather*}
\end{document}
.

** equation environment
.
\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\begin{document}
\begin{equation}
a+b=c
\end{equation}
\end{document}
.

** equation* environment
.
\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\begin{document}
\begin{equation*}
a+b=c
\end{equation*}
\end{document}
.

** multline environment
.
\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\begin{document}
\begin{multline}
a + b + c \\
= d + e
\end{multline}
\end{document}
.

** multline* environment
.
\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\begin{document}
\begin{multline*}
a + b + c \\
= d + e
\end{multline*}
\end{document}
.

** eqnarray environment
.
\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\begin{document}
\begin{eqnarray}
a &=& b + c \\
x &=& y
\end{eqnarray}
\end{document}
.
